name: Verifica Labz
overview:
Verifica Labz is accredited as one of the most promising ventures in the field of Employment Background Verification Services. We at Verifica specialize in just one domain of Background Screening, making our services more comprehensive, industry specific and professional.

We are also one of the first “ONLY EMPLOYMENT BACKGROUND VERIFICATION” Agency in India offering an E-commerce platform to verify online. Now verifications are simpler, faster and more cost effective.

Our robust network across India enables us to offer you with PAN India services with the shortest Turnaround time and Pricing in the Industry.

We don’t brag about the quality, as we believe in performance rather than claims. Our wide range of services include the following:

Address Verification Previous Employment Verification Professional Reference Checks Education Verification Criminal Record Check Court Record Check World Database Checks Document Verifications Drug Tests

offices.address1: #660, 1st Main, 5th Cross, Vinayakanagar, Old Airport Road
